projects.name: Crimsonland
projects.description: Dive into the captivating world of Crimsonland, an e-commerce website where you can acquire treasures inspired by the Konosuba universe. This school project seamlessly blends creativity with technical expertise, crafted using Twig, CSS, and PHP technologies.

projects.name: Webdoc : Electricity
projects.description: Embark on an interactive journey through our web documentary on electricity, created in partnership with CUEJ Strasbourg. Developed using agile methodologies and a team of five, this project presents electricity in an innovative light, employing Twig, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP technologies.

projects.name: Water informations
projects.description: Explore our educational project showcasing valuable water-related data from around the world. Using ChartJs, Tailwind, and JavaScript technologies, we present insightful information in a visually appealing format.

projects.name: Nomad Explorer
projects.description: Nomad Explorer invites you to embark on a virtual journey, exploring the world through travelers' shared experiences. Utilizing the Google Maps API, this educational project highlights unique locations through interactive markers and a detailed list. Symfony, Tailwind, and Google API technologies come together to create this immersive experience.

projects.name: Hair App
projects.description: Hair App is a personal endeavor showcasing humorous hair salons in France. Developed using React, Tailwind, JavaScript, and Next.js technologies, this project offers an interactive and entertaining experience.
